notes.preview: Chronic kidney disease stage 3b management, proteinuria evaluation, medication optimization. CKD likely secondary to diabetic nephropathy and hypertensive nephrosclerosis...

notes.title: Hospital Admission H&P - CHF Exacerbation
notes.author: Dr. Emily Brown
notes.preview: 72-year-old male with HFrEF, T2DM, CKD3b, atrial fibrillation presenting with acute decompensated heart failure. Dyspnea, orthopnea, bilateral LE edema. Triggered by missed furosemide doses...
